title: PM Shehbaz seeks plan for bitcoin mining and asset tokenization
description: A high-level meeting chaired by the Prime Minister of Pakistan convened in Islamabad deliberated on strategic investments in bitcoin mining and the tokenization of real-world assets. This groundbreaking meeting signals Pakistan’s openness to embrace the digital economy and commitment to becoming a global hub for blockchain technology.
